scripts.prebuild:chrome: echo Clearing old build... & npm run clearprevbuild
scripts.build:chrome: echo Building chrome extension... & npm config set xbrowsersync-app:platformPath platform/chrome & npm run commonbuildsteps
scripts.prebuild:android: echo Clearing old build... & npm run clearprevbuild
scripts.build:android: echo Building Android app... & npm config set xbrowsersync-app:platformPath platform/mobileapps & npm run commonbuildsteps
scripts.prebuild:ios: echo Clearing old build... & npm run clearprevbuild
scripts.build:ios: echo Building iOS app... & npm config set xbrowsersync-app:platformPath platform/mobileapps & npm run commonbuildsteps
scripts.commonbuildsteps: npm run copyfiles && npm run compilecss && npm run bundleassets
scripts.copyfiles: cross-var n-copy --source $npm_package_config_platformPath --destination build "*" "**/*" && n-copy --source . --destination build "app.html" "js/app-initialise.js" "css/*" "img/*" "fonts/*" "views/*" && n-copy --source fonts --destination build/fonts "**/*" && n-copy --source node_modules/font-awesome/fonts --destination build/fonts/font-awesome "**/*"
scripts.compilecss: node-sass build/css/font-awesome.scss build/css/font-awesome.css -q & node-sass build/css/styles.scss build/css/styles.css -q & node-sass build/css/platform.scss build/css/platform.css -q
scripts.bundleassets: minify build/css/font-awesome.css node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css build/css/styles.css build/css/platform.css | n-pipe build/css/styles.min.css & n-concat node_modules/angular/angular.min.js node_modules/angular-animate/angular-animate.min.js node_modules/angular-complexify/build/angular-complexify.min.js node_modules/angular-sanitize/angular-sanitize.min.js node_modules/ng-infinite-scroll/build/ng-infinite-scroll.min.js node_modules/underscore/underscore-min.js node_modules/crypto-js/crypto-js.js node_modules/hammerjs/hammer.min.js node_modules/angular-hammer/angular.hammer.min.js node_modules/fastclick/lib/fastclick.js node_modules/qrious/dist/qrious.min.js | n-pipe build/js/dependencies.min.js & uglifyjs --beautify --source-map filename=scripts.min.js.map,url=scripts.min.js.map,includeSources --output build/js/scripts.min.js -- js/global.js js/utility.js js/httpInterceptor.js js/api.js js/bookmarks.js js/platform.js build/js/platformImplementation.js js/app.js
scripts.androidbuildsteps: echo Building cordova project... & n-copy --source build --destination build/cordova/www --ignore cordova/** "*" "**/*" & n-copy --source build/cordova --destination build/cordova/platforms/android AndroidManifest.xml & n-copy --source build/cordova/InAppBrowser --destination build/cordova/platforms/android/src/org/apache/cordova/inappbrowser InAppBrowser.java && cd build/cordova && cordova build android
scripts.iosbuildsteps: echo Building cordova project... & node-sass build/css/ios.scss build/css/ios.css -q && minify build/css/ios.css > build/css/ios.min.css && n-concat build/css/styles.min.css | n-pipe build/css/styles2.min.css && n-concat build/css/styles2.min.css build/css/ios.min.css | n-pipe build/css/styles.min.css && n-copy --source build --destination build/cordova/www --ignore cordova/** "*" "**/*" && n-copy --source build/cordova/shareExt --destination build/cordova/platforms/ios/shareExt "*" && n-copy --source build/cordova/InAppBrowser --destination build/cordova/platforms/ios/xBrowserSync/Plugins/cordova-plugin-inappbrowser CDVInAppBrowser.m && n-copy --source build/cordova/res/artwork/ios --destination build/cordova/platforms/ios/xBrowserSync/Resources iTunesArtwork && cd build/cordova && cordova build ios
